Player History
Released by New York (N) on 10/6/1965...
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1968...
Injured on 5/30/1968 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/27/1969 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
